data.Description (en): Hybrid real-world asset tokenization system. The Curio network provides real-world asset tokenization functionality in the Kusama/Polkadot ecosystem and brings dApps by CurioDAO such as Real-world Assets Tokenization Launchpad, Capital DEX (AMM DEX), RollApp NFT Launchpad, Curio StableCoin Protocol with Governance.
data.Description (zh): 混合實境世界資產代幣化系統。 Curio 網路在Kusama/Polkadot 生態系統中提供現實世界資產代幣化功能，並帶來CurioDAO 的dApp，例如現實世界資產代幣化Launchpad、Capital DEX (AMM DEX)、RollApp NFT Launchpad、Curio StableCoin Protocol with Governance 。
